name: Verify Suit Can Be Obtained
description: Validates that the player can successfully interact with and obtain the suit from the wall.
testObjective: Ensure the suit interaction mechanic functions correctly and the suit is added to player inventory.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has not yet obtained the suit

steps.action: Identify the glowing suit embedded in the wall
steps.expected: Suit is visible and glowing, indicating it is interactable

steps.action: Approach the suit until interaction prompt appears
steps.expected: Interaction prompt appears indicating [E] to interact

steps.action: Press [E] to interact with the suit
steps.expected: Suit is obtained and removed from the wall

steps.action: Verify suit has been added to player inventory/state
steps.expected: Suit is now in player possession (visual indicator or inventory confirmation)

postconditions: Suit is no longer visible on the wall
Player can now access the ladder
